attributes.additional_details: They have the power to advise the governing bodies to waive the fees
attributes.background:
Nurses, midwives and doctors pay an annual registration fee of up to £399 to the Nursing and Midwifery Council and the General Medical Council in order to work. 

We ask that these fees are waived for the next 12 months as thank you for all the hard work and dedication they’ve given.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307399

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: 
https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
